challenges.challenge: Learn to juggle three balls for one minute straight.
Cook a three-course meal without using a recipe.
Write a short story in a genre you've never tried before.
Create a piece of abstract art using only household items as tools.
Learn a new dance routine and perform it in front of an audience.
Build a piece of furniture from scratch.
Complete a 1000-piece jigsaw puzzle in under 24 hours.
Run a marathon or participate in a long-distance race.
Learn to play a musical instrument and perform a song in public.
Master a new language and hold a conversation with a native speaker.
Plan and execute a successful surprise party for a friend or family member.
Solve a Rubik's Cube in under 5 minutes.
Create a short film and submit it to a local film festival.
Design and build a functional website from scratch.
Write and perform an original stand-up comedy routine at an open mic night.
Grow your own vegetable garden and cook a meal using only homegrown ingredients.
Learn to knit or crochet and create a wearable item such as a scarf or hat.
Write and record an original song, including vocals and instrumentation.
Organize a community cleanup event to help improve the local environment.
Learn to perform a magic trick and amaze your friends and family.
Take up a new sport and compete in a local tournament.
Write and publish a book, either fiction or non-fiction.
Create a budget and stick to it for one month, tracking all expenses.
Learn to code and develop a simple mobile app or game.
Complete a 30-day fitness challenge, such as running every day or doing push-ups.
Take up photography and capture a series of stunning landscape images.
Learn to sew and create your own clothing or accessories.
Write a blog post every day for a month on a topic of your choice.
Learn to meditate and practice mindfulness every day for a month.
Take up painting and create a series of original artworks to display in a gallery.
Learn to play a new board game and master its strategies.
Plan and execute a road trip to visit multiple cities or landmarks in your region.
Learn to bake bread from scratch, including making your own sourdough starter.
Start a YouTube channel and create regular content on a topic you're passionate about.
Take up woodworking and build a piece of furniture for your home.
Learn a new card game and become skilled enough to compete in local tournaments.
Volunteer at a local charity or nonprofit organization for a month.
Learn to play a new instrument and perform a song in front of an audience.
Write and publish an e-book on a topic you're knowledgeable about.
Learn to do a backflip or other gymnastics move.
Create a budget and save a specific amount of money for a personal goal.
Learn to play chess and compete in a local tournament.
Take up calligraphy and create your own custom stationery or artwork.
Start a podcast on a topic you're passionate about and produce regular episodes.
Learn to make sushi at home, including mastering the art of sushi rice.
Write and illustrate a graphic novel or comic book.
Learn to do a handstand or other advanced yoga pose.
Take up astronomy and learn to identify constellations and planets in the night sky.
Learn to make pottery on a wheel and create your own ceramic pieces.
Start a small business selling homemade crafts or products online.
Learn to make your own soap or candles from scratch.
Take up archery and become skilled enough to hit a bullseye consistently.
Learn to make your own clothes, including sewing and pattern-making.
Write a letter to a friend or family member every day for a month.
Learn to identify different bird species in your area and keep a birdwatching journal.
Take up fencing and compete in a local tournament.
Learn to solve a Rubik's Cube blindfolded.
Start a herb or vegetable garden and grow your own food at home.
Learn to do magic tricks and perform a magic show for friends and family.
Start a YouTube cooking channel and share your favorite recipes and cooking tips.
Take up rock climbing and climb an outdoor route.
Learn to play a new sport and join a local team or league.
Write and perform a rap song or freestyle.
Learn to do calligraphy and create your own custom stationery or artwork.
Start a book club with friends and read a book together each month.
Learn to identify different types of wine and host a wine tasting party.
Take up scuba diving and explore an underwater reef or shipwreck.
Learn to play a new instrument and perform a song in front of an audience.
Create a podcast on a topic you're passionate about and produce regular episodes.
Learn to make homemade ice cream from scratch, including experimenting with flavors.
